issue.title: [JS] @apache-arrow/ts nor apache-arrow does not compile
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12209](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12209). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I posted the problem on StackOverflow hoping that it's just a config issue:
<https://stackoverflow.com/questions/66955863/apache-arrow-ts-does-not-compile>

<https://stackoverflow.com/questions/66956030/apache-arrow-does-not-compile-with-typescript>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12209?focusedCommentId=17317553) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
